mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parts ( id, inNumber, inNIIN, inPartsName, inCode, fun, material, inPrice, thickness, deleteTime, color, lotSize, lotSizeMax, lotSizeMin, category, time, isVirtualPart, isInUse, isForeignDeployment ) VALUES ( parts_seq.NEXTVAL, #{inNumber}, #{inNIIN}, #{inPartsName}, #{inCode}, #{fun}, #{material}, #{inPrice}, #{thickness}, #{deleteTime}, #{color}, #{lotSize}, #{lotSizeMax}, #{lotSizeMin}, #{category}, #{time}, #{isVirtualPart}, #{isInUse}, #{isForeignDeployment} )
